info.description: Fluxend is backend as-a-service platform that allows you to build, deploy, and scale applications without managing infrastructure.
info.title: Fluxend API

get.description: Check the health status of the system
Retrieve all settings for the application
Retrieve a list of all backups for the specified project
Get details of a specific backup

delete.description: Remove a backup from the project

get.description: Retrieve a list of all files in a specific container

post.description: Create a new file in a specific container

get.description: Get details of a specific file

delete.description: Permanently remove a specific file from a container

put.description: Update the name of a specific file. In other words, moves the file to a new location.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all forms for the specified project

post.description: Add a new form with a name and description

get.description: Get details of a specific form

put.description: Update form details such as name and description

delete.description: Remove a form from the project

get.description: Retrieve a list of all fields in a specific form

post.description: Add a new field to a form

get.description: Get details of a specific field

put.description: Update the details of an existing field

delete.description: Remove a specific field from the form

get.description: Get all form responses for a specific form

post.description: Store a new form response for a specific form

requestBody.description: Request body to create a new form response

get.description: Get details of a specific form response
Retrieve a list of all functions for the specified schema

post.description: Add a new function for specific schema

get.description: Get details of a specific function

delete.description: Remove a function from the schema

get.description: Get all organizations
Get details of a specific organization
Get all users in an organization

post.description: Add a new user to an organization

delete.description: Remove a user from an organization

get.description: Get all projects for a specific organization

post.description: Create a new project for a specific organization

get.description: Get details of a specific project

put.description: Update a project for a specific organization

delete.description: Remove a project from the organization

get.description: Get all logs
Get statistics for project
Retrieve a list of container in a specified project.

post.description: Add a new container to a project

get.description: Get details of a specific container

delete.description: Remove a container from a project

get.description: Retrieve a list of tables in a specified project.

post.description: Define and create a new table within a specified project.
Define and create a new table within a specified project.

get.description: Retrieve a list of columns in a specified table.

post.description: Create new columns in a specified table within a project.

patch.description: Update the data type of existing columns in a specified table and remove any columns not included in the request.

put.description: Change the name of a specific column in a given table.

delete.description: Permanently delete a specific column from a given table.

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific table within a project.

delete.description: Permanently delete a specific table from a given project.

put.description: Create a copy of a specified table within a project.

get.description: Retrieve a list of indexes for a given table.

post.description: Add an index to a specified table within a project.

get.description: Retrieve details for a specific index in a table.

delete.description: Remove an existing index from a given table.

put.description: Change the name of a specific table within a project.

post.description: Add a new user with a name, email, and password
Authenticate a user and return a JWT token
Invalidate the JWT token to log out a user

get.description: Get details of logged-in specific user
Get details of a specific user

put.description: Update a user's details such as name, email, and password

date_format.description: fails if provided and field value doesn't match

min_length.description: all fields from this point are optional

date_format.description: fails if provided and field value doesn't match

min_length.description: all fields from this point are optional
